General.Name: Altus Power Inc
General.Description: Altus Power, Inc., a clean electrification company, develops, owns, constructs, and operates roof, ground, and carport-based photovoltaic solar energy generation and storage systems. It serves commercial, industrial, public sector, and community solar customers. The company was founded in 2013 and is headquartered in Stamford, Connecticut.
General.Address: 2200 Atlantic Street, Stamford, CT, United States, 06902
